about: 경쟁의 세계인 만큼 성적이 부진할 때도 있다고 생각합니다.
이럴 때에도 우리는 목적 달성을 위해 지속적으로 끈질기게 노력하며 끝까지 해낼 수 있는 무한한 힘과 가능성을 가지고 있습니다.

desc: 이 프로젝트는 Nyam Gaming & REVATI 의 Overwatch2 코칭 프로젝트입니다.
※현재, 수강료와 코치 목록은 일본어로만 제공됩니다. 결제는 일본 엔화(JPY)로만 가능합니다.

goods.desc: 팀 로고와 멤버들이 담긴 아크릴 키링이 발매되었습니다! 마음에 드는 아이템을 선택해 주시고, 앞으로도 REVATI 를 응원해 주시면 감사하겠습니다.
goods.storeLinkTitle: REVATI ( revati_jp ) | Online shopping for original items ∞ SUZURI

desc: (Hereinafter called “Our website”) will appropriately protect user's personal information and manage them based on following policy.
1: Our team might collect these data if needed.
In addition, to comprehend user's access status, our website uses

Cloudflare Web Analytics will collect metrics about usage status without using client-side circumstances such as Cookie or localStorage. Besides, we might acquire individual ”fingerprints” through IP address, user-agent, and other data in order to show analysis. This analysis is harmless and respect user's privacy.
2: Collected personal information will be used for these purposes.
Analyzing usage status of our website
3: Providing personal information to third party
Our team as well as our website will not provide personal information to third party without user's permission, except these situations.
When we have permission of user
When providing to outsourcing company (ex: delivery company)
4: Our team is taking following measures to protect personal information.
Managing data by having access limitation
Also, to protect personal information, our website encrypt data by using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
5: Requesting to confirm, correct, and delete user's personal information
Requiring our team to suspend using one's personal information
To enforce this right, please contact to the email address described below “8. Contact information”.
6: Our website is currently not using Cookie. When using Cookie, we will state the purpose and detail on this privacy policy and properly acquire consent from the users.
7: There are some circumstances our team will change this privacy policy. Changed privacy policy will be applied from the moment it's announced on this website.
8: Please contact us if you have any questions regarding to this privacy policy.

error.404: 찾고 계신 페이지를 찾을 수 없습니다.
